Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: powders with pure perovskite structure have been synthesized from mixtures of La2O3, SrCO3, and Co3O4, irradiated in a domestic microwave oven (DMO) with 2.4.5 GHz and 700-800 W output for no more than 25 min.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: It is found that Co3O4 couples with microwave well and raises its temperature greatly within 3 min, while neither La2O3 nor SrCO3 absorbs microwave energy at the ordinary temperature.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: The microwave synthesizing conditions depend on the Sr2+ replacement amount, and get difficult when x is high.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: The traditional solid state reaction method is compared to treat the same mixtures.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: it appears that the pure phases of LSC cannot be obtained until 1100-1200 degreesC for 4 h. The lower temperature and shorter time with microwave irradiation might be ascribed to the activating and facilitating effect of microwave on solid phase diffusion.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: The LSC powders made by the microwave process were screen-printed onto compact yttrium-doped ceria (YDC) pellets.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: the common electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), to observe the interaction between them.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: SEM photograph shows that LSC film has good sintering and porous properties, and fair compatibility with YDC.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation
A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation

Sentencas: microwave irradiation is proved to be a novel, extremely facile, time-saving and energy-efficient route to the synthesis of LSC powders.
Titulo: A novel route of synthesizing La1-xSrxCoO3 by microwave irradiation
